CHANNEL_CREATE.publicDesc: Anyone on your team can view and join this channel.

dlg-accountInfo.attentionPlaceholder: Separate words or phrases with commas. Highlight words are not case sensitive.
dlg-accountInfo.attentionWordDesc: We'll send notifications automatically when someone mentions your name or sends you a direct message. If you'd also like to be notified when someone mentions a specific word or phrase, add it to your highlight words list and we'll make that happen.
dlg-accountInfo.logonRecordDesc1: Security starts with knowledge. This page lists details about access to your account. If you notice a problem, you can
dlg-accountInfo.logonRecordLabel: The details about access to your account.
dlg-accountInfo.mainInactiveDesc: If you no longer need your account on the chinapine team, you can deactivate your account. Any other Slack teams you belong to will not be affected.
dlg-accountInfo.mainLogoffDesc: Lost your phone? Left yourself logged in on a public computer? Need a way to sign out everywhere except your current browser? This is for you.
dlg-accountInfo.mainTimezoneDesc: System uses your time zone to send notification
dlg-accountInfo.mainTimezoneLabel: Your time zone is currently set to: {0}
dlg-accountInfo.markAsReadDesc: By default, Mission marks messages as read as soon as you view the channel or DM. You can choose to leave messages unread until you have seen the oldest unread message.

markAsReadOption.option1: Default: automatically scroll me to the oldest unread message and mark the channel as having been read.
markAsReadOption.option2: Do not scroll me to the oldest unread message, but still mark the messages as having been read when I switch.
markAsReadOption.option3: Do not scroll me or automatically mark messages as read — wait until I've seen the oldest unread message.

dlg-accountInfo.noteMessageDesc: {0: Note:}Don't deactivate your account if you just want to {1:  change your email address} or {2:  change your username}
dlg-accountInfo.noticeEmailDesc: When you’re not online, system can send you email notifications for any message mentions of your name.
dlg-accountInfo.noticeTipLabel: Mission can send push notifications to your mobile device or your desktop when someone sends you a direct message or uses one of your Highlight Words (which includes your name).
dlg-accountInfo.receiveNewsAndMsgDesc: From time to time, we’d like to send you emails with interesting news about the product and your company. You can choose which of these updates you’d like to receive:
dlg-accountInfo.receiveNewsAndMsgOption: Send me emails with Mission news and tips
dlg-accountInfo.title: Account
dlg-accountInfo.userNote: Most people choose to use their first name, last name, nickname, or some combination of those with initials.
dlg-accountInfo.usernameDesc: Usernames must be all lowercase. They cannot be longer than 21 characters and can only contain letters, numbers, periods, hyphens, and underscores.
dlg-accountInfo.usernameNotice: {0: Note that you cannot change your username more than twice per hour.} Choose wisely.

debuggingList.debuggingText: Changing these preferences will reload Mission.
debuggingList.optionDesc1: This will disable Mission from storing data on your computer, and can be used to debug lagginess in the Mission UI.
debuggingList.optionDesc2: This will make loading emoji slower, but it might help if you are experiencing slowness in the Mission UI.
debuggingList.optionDesc3: This will help our engineers track down performance issues with Mission.

displayOptionList.label: Display Options
displayOptionList.option1: Display information about who is currently typing a message
displayOptionList.option2: Display real names instead of usernames (team default)
displayOptionList.option3: Show times with 24-hour clock (16:00 rather than 4:00 PM)
displayOptionList.optionDesc4: If you use a language with accented characters, this will improve font appearance. Requires reload to take effect.

emojiStyleList.label: Emoji Style
emojiStyleList.optionDesc6: Display the jumbo versions of emoji (up to 23 at a time!) in messages containing no text

inlineMediaList.label: Inline Media $ Links:
inlineMediaList.option1: Expand images and files uploaded to Mission
inlineMediaList.option2: Expand links to images,video and audio from external sources
inlineMediaList.option3: Even if it is an image larger than 2MB
inlineMediaList.option4: Expand website links to show a preview of the content,when available

inputOption.option2: Only show autocomplete for people when the '@' character is used
inputOption.option3: When typing code with ```, Enter should not send the message
inputOption.option4: Use and to cycle through your typed history
inputOption.optionDesc3: With this checked use Shift+Enter to send
inputOption.optionDesc4: With this checked, use Ctrl + to edit your last message

messageThemeList.label: Message Theme

dlg-preference.msgHintShortcutEsc: Mark a channel as read by hitting the Esc key.

dlg-preference.muteSoundsDesc: Includes system alerts and notifications for messages
dlg-preference.notInterruptDesc: When Do Not Disturb is activated, Mission won't send desktop, mobile, or email notifications. You can manually snooze notifications by clicking the icon by your name.

dlg-preference.notifyLinkText: set preferences for email and mobile notifications

MANAGE_TEAM.title: Team Members
MANAGE_TEAM.userGroupsTip1: While commands like {0:@everyone}, {1:@channel}, and {2:@here} call the attention of team members in a conversation, User Groups let you choose exactly who should get your message.
MANAGE_TEAM.userGroupsTip2: Choose a group name, like {0:@design} or {1:@marketing}, then select the group members. Now, when someone on your team mentions the User Group, only its members will be notified. You can even add those team members to Channels of your choice automatically!

SIGNOUT_ACCOUNT.resetAccountDesc: Get a magic link by email to automatically sign in on our mobile or desktop apps.
SIGNOUT_ACCOUNT.resetAccountMsg: You have been signed out of all other sessions.
SIGNOUT_ACCOUNT.resetIntroduce: If you’ve just reset your password (hopefully to something stronger and more secure), you can easily sign in on mobile using a magic link. Open the magic link email on your mobile device, click the link, and you’ll be all set with your new password!
SIGNOUT_ACCOUNT.resetedOption1: Reset all cookies used for Mission sign in (except in your current browser)
SIGNOUT_ACCOUNT.resetedOption5: Disconnect any Mission clients currently connected with your account
